testcase.classname: users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to register page.......................................passed And user select gender......................................................passed When enter first name and last name.........................................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email........................................................passed And user fills Password fields..............................................passed Then user could register successfully.......................................passed

testcase.classname: users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed And user enter email and password "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".........passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could not login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed And user enter email and password "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"........passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: User can switch between currencies US Dollar - Euro
testcase.name: User changes currency from US Dollar to Euro
testcase.system-out: Given User clicks on drop list..............................................passed When User clicks on Euro....................................................passed Then User find the price of products in Euro................................passed

testcase.name: user could search using product name
testcase.system-out: Given user click on search field............................................passed And user enter "book" to search.............................................passed Then user find the product and relative products............................passed

testcase.system-out: Given user click on search field............................................passed And user enter "laptop" to search...........................................passed Then user find the product and relative products............................passed
